HelpBalloon.title: Extended statistics
HelpBalloon.content:
X% of sent mailings were opened on average
Displays the average percentage of recipients who opened the mailings.

Best performing mailing (with send date)
Identifies the best-performing mailing based on the combined metrics of clickers, openers, and revenue generated.

Worst performing mailing (with send date)
Highlights the worst-performing mailing using the metrics of clickers, openers, and revenue generated.

Average revenue
Shows the average total revenue generated.
